name: Kodiak Rover II Arctic Grip SaltShield Waterproof Insulated Boots - Men's
categories: Rover II Arctic Grip SaltShield Waterproof In
description: Comfort and serious warmth make these boots an easy choice for ultra-cold winter days. Beneath the Rover II’s stout shell lies next level weather protection. Equipped with waterproof SaltShield™ leather, ample insulation and a sole that grips in the cold, these boots are ready for deep, dark winter days.Waterproof SaltShield full-grain leather repels damage that salt can cause, simply brush off salt stains, no discoloration or damage will stay on your boot.REPEL-X® waterproof breathable membrane, your feet can breathe while staying dry.400 grams of Thinsulate™ synthetic insulation light and efficient.Soft microfibre lining is warm and wicks away moisture.Contoured EVA insole offers comfortable support but is removeable should you want to add your own.Vibram Arctic Grip outsole provides incredible traction on wet ice.Kodiak rates these boots down to -30°C.
